filmJson.name: VistaVision
filmJson.fact1: This format's frames were captured on the film reel horizontally, instead of the traditional vertical
filmJson.fact2: This format had a natural aspect ratio of 1.5:1 but could be further cropped and set to a range of ratios, with motion pictures set in 1.66:1, 1.85:1, and 1.96:1
filmJson.fact3: This format provided a higher quality image but used a lot more film, so it struggled to compete with other anamorphic or 70mm formats of the era
